description:
The watchTowr Platform MCP (Model Compatibility Protocol) Server acts as a real-time integration layer between watchTowr’s world-class External Attack Surface Management and Vulnerability Intelligence technology, and LLM agents, enabling seamless ingestion and understanding of newly discovered threats and exposures. 

Security teams can now equip AI agents with structured access to timely vulnerability data—empowering use cases from attack surface triage to dynamic reporting and contextual prioritization.

WATCHTOWR_API_KEY.description: Your watchTowr Platform API key for authentication.

capabilities.name: list_cisa_kev_findings
capabilities.description: List findings that are tagged as CISA-KEV (Known Exploited Vulnerabilities).

capabilities.name: list_findings_by_severity
capabilities.description: List findings by severity level (Critical, High, Medium, Low).

capabilities.name: list_recent_assets
capabilities.description: List the most recently discovered assets.

capabilities.name: get_activity_logs
capabilities.description: Get recent activity logs from the watchTowr Platform.

capabilities.name: list_recent_hunts
capabilities.description: List recent hunts, optionally including their results.

capabilities.name: get_watchtowr_source_ips
capabilities.description: Get watchTowr Platform Source IP addresses that should be whitelisted.
